Question
========

It is tested whether a coin is pure (H~0~: probability of cross above is 0.5) against the alternative that it is not (H~a~: probability of cross above is greater than 0.5). The coin is tossed 50 times and cross comes up 30 times. The P-value associated with this result is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.08
* 0.16
* 0.5

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.08: Correct
* 0.16: Incorrect
* 0.5: Incorrect
